alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 2:54PM PDT until March 13 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 6 PM PDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
